title: Broken-Hearted One-Night Love ~This Man Is Cunning And Sweet~
alternative_title: Broken-Hearted One-Night Love ~This Man Is Cunning and Sweet~;Shitsuren One Night Love - Kono Otoko wa Zurukute Amai ;Shitsuren One Night Love
status: Broken-Hearted One-Night Love ~This Man Is Cunning and Sweet~;Shitsuren One Night Love - Kono Otoko wa Zurukute Amai ;Shitsuren One Night Love
description:
Description :
        "Let me hear your cute moans more." Yuzuru was dumped by his boyfriend exactly on his birthday. At this worst possible moment, he met a flirty man called Zen. "Can you really sleep by yourself tonight?" Even though it's their first meeting, Zen quickly made his way inside his broken heart... he has Yuzuru's at his mercy, entangling their hot tongues in a sweet kiss, and teasing him deep inside as they have s**.+
